item.title: CV
item.description: Download the CV in PDF format Fields of interest Data Analytics / Data Science Professional experience Service Delivery Manager ECONOCOM - July 2018 – Sep 2021 Managed the technical support operations as per service contract Team management - shift planning, professional training, conflictmanagement Analysis and reporting (Python / Pandas) to upper management Developed an analytical application (Python / JS) to support theteam operations (see portfolio for further details) Incident Manager ECONOCOM - Feb 2018 – July 2018
